data.eml:eml: Hungarosoma bokori Verhoeff, 1928 (Diplopoda: Chordeumatida): new insights into its taxonomy, systematics, molecular genetics, biogeography and ecology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mock, Andrej, Tajovský, Karel, Žurovcová, Martina, Jarošová, Andrea, Kocourek, Pavel, Gruber, Jürgen, Angyal, Dorottya, Spelda, Jörg (2016): Hungarosoma bokori Verhoeff, 1928 (Diplopoda: Chordeumatida): new insights into its taxonomy, systematics, molecular genetics, biogeography and ecology. Zootaxa 4178 (2): 234-256, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4178.2.4
